content.question: The construction of canals depicted on the map most directly contributed to which of the following changes?

choices.label: The rise of the Populist movement
The widespread emergence of organized labor unions
The Southâ€™s increased reliance on cotton production
The development of new towns and cities

content.answer: The development of new towns and cities

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
